channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Texas AG Ken Paxton sues to boot Muslims' CAIR from the state
item.description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton filed a lawsuit Thursday seeking the ouster of CAIR from the Lone Star State, claiming the Muslim rights group viola...

item.title: The Egregious Haitian-Immigration Decision
item.description: A federal judge’s ruling blocking President Trump from ending Haiti’s protected status doesn’t pass the smell test.

item.title: Deporting Illegal Aliens Isn’t Complicated. Don’t Let Democrats Complicate It

item.title: The Administration’s War on Drug Development
item.description: Capping drug companies’ prices and blocking their market access is the surest way to deter investment in medical innovation.

item.title: Mike ‘Pick Me’ Pence’s Opposition To The SAVE Act Is Dishonest And Constitutionally Illiterate
item.description: Pence felt the need to slither out of political obscurity to finger wag at people who actually want to safeguard elections against noncitizen voters.

item.title: OPM finalizes rule that makes it easier to remove federal workers

item.title: Is Feminism Compatible With Christianity? Something Wicked Says Absolutely Not
item.description: Something Wicked asks us to take a step back and evaluate an ideology that pursues pure individual autonomy by trampling upon the lives of others.

item.title: Stalled Battle Against Woke Science Shows Trump Can’t End The Entire Deep State By Himself
item.description: For Trump, the problem at the NSF is the problem in the entire government. Do the agencies carry out the president's directives?

item.title: Where Ice and ICE Meet
item.description: On the south side of Minneapolis, getting rid of the ice has a different meaning.

item.title: Supreme Court’s New Anti-Leak Measures Are A Good Start
item.description: The judiciary is essential to the republic, and Chief Justice Roberts has taken an excellent step in safeguarding the hallowed deliberative process.

item.title: Overreliance on Renewables Leaves Americans Out in the Cold
item.description: Americans are at greater risk of power outages when we rely too much on wind, solar, and battery storage systems.

item.title: The Guidelines Are Changing. My Body Never Will
item.description: For detransitioners like me, the change in medical recommendations regarding gender-affirming care is too late.
